docs.snippet: The Obama administration has decided to give people more time to sign up for health insurance if they were blocked by technical problems with the federal exchange....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Obama administration has decided to give people more time to sign up for health insurance if they were blocked by technical problems with the federal exchange.
docs.abstract: Obama administration says that it will allow more time for those who have tried to apply for health insurance but were blocked by technical problems with the federal exchange; White House had previously insisted that deadline for open enrollment was firm and would not be extended.

headline.main: U.S. to Extend Sign-Up Period for Insurance
headline.print_headline: U.S. to Extend Sign-Up Period for Insurance

docs.snippet: While a trend of increasing drought that may be linked to global warming has been documented in some regions, there is no scientific consensus yet that it is a worldwide phenomenon....
docs.lead_paragraph: While a trend of increasing drought that may be linked to global warming has been documented in some regions, there is no scientific consensus yet that it is a worldwide phenomenon.
docs.abstract: Some of leading experts in climate change suggest that it most likely has little role in causing California's current drought; scientists maintain that Obama administration was right to cite climate change when announcing aid for the drought-stricken state, as effects of drought appear to have been made worse by climatic warning.

headline.main: Science Linking Drought to Global Warming Remains Matter of Dispute
headline.print_headline: Science Linking Drought to Global Warming Remains Matter of Dispute

docs.snippet: President Obama signed an executive order to ensure that employees of federal contractors are paid at least $10.10 an hour starting in 2015....
docs.abstract: President Obama signed an executive order to ensure that employees of federal contractors are paid at least $10.10 an hour starting in 2015.

docs.snippet: The president cannot both open markets and close the wage gap....
docs.lead_paragraph: The president cannot both open markets and close the wage gap.
docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by former Democratic Rep David E Bonior submits that Pres Obama's call, during State of the Union address, for fast-track authority as way to speed up consideration of Trans-Pacific Partnership is at odds with his call for reducing income inequality; says partnership has potential to negatively affect jobs available to those without college degree and to undermine middle class.

docs.snippet: President Obama will send his annual budget to Congress on March 4....
docs.abstract: President Obama will send his annual budget to Congress on March 4.

docs.snippet: Immigrant leaders see a broad community impact as deportations separate parents from children and undocumented immigrants from those here legally....
docs.lead_paragraph: Immigrant leaders see a broad community impact as deportations separate parents from children and undocumented immigrants from those here legally.
docs.abstract: Immigrant leaders say record rate of deportation under Obama administration has taken broad community toll as families are torn asunder and lives irrevocably changed; immigrants, stunned by deportations and deeply frustrated with lack of progress on reform, are calling on Obama to use his executive authority to end the practice.

headline.main: Amid Steady Deportation, Fear and Worry Multiply Among Immigrants
headline.print_headline: Fears Multiply Amid a Surge in Deportation
